review: This item arrived on time and was simple to set up and use. What I have a problem with is it states it was new and this was not the case. Safety tape on box had been broken and when I started set up,another users name and wifi info was stored.  Have no idea what this may do warranty wise.
author: Maria Rodriguez

review: worked ok for awhile and then just stopped.
author: Jim Butler

review: I am absolutely amazed with it's ease of use, the quality and the wide variety of programming  available. I'm sharpening up my scissors!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent item to have in home, one or two cables less around TV set,  The transmition is as it is trough the cable!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Fancy Google player. If you like to watch Netflix or something, this is for you.If you want to steam files from NAS, stay away from it. It does have some capabilities to do that, but you need a lot of magic to make it happen.
author: Dmitry

review: Life changing if you use and ipad to "cast" shows onto the TV
author: tactech
